boardgame.name: Karmaka
卡瑪卡
boardgame.description: From the creators of Osmos comes Karmaka, a competitive card game that plays out over multiple lives._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Karmaka is a tactical card game set in a karmic universe. Players begin the game as lowly Dung Beetles. In life after life (hand after hand) they climb their way up the Karmic Ladder, racing to see who will achieve Transcendence first! During each of your lives you'll be working towards three ends:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Score enough points to climb the Ladder and keep up with your rivals._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Stash a good selection of cards to your Future Life. This will become your opening hand next life._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Play cards for their abilities to help yourself or to hinder others._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But what goes around comes around. A key tension in Karmaka is that after playing a card for its ability, a rival may take the card into their Future Life. Your actions may come back to haunt you in the next life..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Score points to ascend while sowing the seeds of your next life, and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; if necessary _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; sabotage your rivals. But remember, what goes around comes around, and your actions have consequences in this life...and the next._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2016 SXSW Gamer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Voice: Best Indie Game of the Year (Multiplayer) Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
